Summary: 12 to 15 yellow/orange lights moving in rigid formation over bldg first single file and then some simple patterns (triangle) at end appeared to be connected moving slowly
divs: sighting detailsstanding on patio 5 floors up at my residence and saw a group of yellow\orange, pulsating\flikering lights moving slowly in formation overhead at low altitude. as i have never seen anything comparable in my life, i had no idea what this was. at the time i saw it my reaction was confusion, curiosity, and shock. i saw the lights almost directly above my position for about 15 to 20 seconds and finally the passed out of view behind the building in which i live.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Madison
There were no other sightings in Madison on or around September 29th 2011
